content: looking for the perfect granny square that s both easy and stunning the **easy spiked stitch granny square** is flat modern and beginner-friendly with crisp edges and no holes this textured square is perfect for joining into blankets bags garments and more the spike stitch adds just enough flair to make your project stand out without making it complicated this pattern includes * a clear easy-to-follow pdf no abbreviations * left- and right-handed video tutorials * ideal for scrap yarn fast makes and stash-busting * instructions that are great for beginners and experienced crocheters alike your next crochet project just got a whole lot more fun and a whole lot more polished ✅ free pattern https //bit ly/3g7yzss ✅ printable pdf pattern https //bit ly/4l7ughg ✅ right handed tutorial https //youtu be/k0mjwlhl6kw ✅ left handed tutorial https //youtu be/nl22hzydlta
